description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
trial number within participant and session (1-12)
within-participant manipulation (base = control/ con = see/ exp = infer)
location of baited cup on platform (left/ right)
whether participants picked the baited cup (1) or not (0)
whether they succeeded and obtain the reward (correct) or not (incorrect)
